com.parkingtycoon.helpers

Class FixedRingArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parkingtycoon.helpers.FixedRingArray

  • public class FixedRingArray
extends java.lang.Object
    Tis class is responsible for providing help as a good mix between a Queue and Array. A C++ example: http://gameprogrammingpatterns.com/event-queue.html#what-goes-in-the-queue
    Author:
    Timo Strating

    • Method Detail

      • size

        public int size()
        Get the Length of the stored data. We use size because we need to calculate the value.
        Returns:
        the length of the stored data.

      • put

        public void put(float value)
        Add a value to the array, if there is no space left on the right side of the array than the array will start to loop around on itself In the case that the array has reached it maximum size than the array will override the fist value with the last.

      • get

        public float get(int index)
        Get a value out of the float array.
        Parameters:
        index - the N item you want. may cause index out of range Exception, so check te size beforehand.
        Returns:
        the value out of the float array.
